Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Kup : :

Kup sees that his old security code wasn't working. The computer had been tampered with.

Kup: Damn! I cant bring the shields down that way. Convoy is correct about isolating your fire on direct points thought. The deflector shields will be weakest on the port and starboard sides where the shield generators are located. Concentrate your fire there, then procede to the autoguns, once you have broken through the shields.

Kup then listens to QuetZalcoatl and Empath.

Kup: I should be ordering you away from here! This starship is Autobot property and falls under the protection of the Maximals. I'm not about to let any slaggin' Preds or Decepticreeps tamper with it.

Kup takes aim at Empath, and releases three plasma shots.

Kup also sees who has arrived and is talking to WheelJack-X.

Kup: Grimlock?! Is that you, lad? How can any of you Dinobots be here? I thought the last of the Autobot ranks were killed when the Tripredacus took over Cbertron.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
QuetZalcoatl:

Quezalcoatl looked that the sistems are shutting down "He might 
be... OHHH NOOOO!!!"

The male ran to the fallen shipe and soon reached the main computer. 
and typed some buttons, trying to hack the passwords and stop them 
before they could came in.

At least he did it and started to work.... It was done, the 
computers and all the ship was under his command, he opened com link 
to Kup "I don't know who you're but if you and your pals don't left 
this area you will be history before history begins"


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> : : Kup : :
> 
> Kup arrived at the Ark, only to see the mighty Autobot starships 
automated defenses come online.
> 
> He transformes to robot mode, drawing his plasma rifle from 
subspace. Kup tries to remember his old identification from the era 
that the Ark was bult in order to shut it down.
> 
> Kup: Ark, computer interface. Identification: Autobot Military 
Academy Commedant, Iacon City Security Chief, Kup. Authorization 
security code: Kup-47-alpha-tango.
> 
> Kup hoped that his old security clearance would work and shut down 
the defenses.
> 
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Quickly, as he saw he had no time to dodge the shots fired at him,
> Yggdrasil drew his shield up from his back and tried to block as 
best
> as he could.
> 
> Yggdrasil: Kup! Try to do the speech part because I'll just kill 
them!
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > As they neared the Ark, Teletran's defenses fired up. Detecting 
the
> group 
> > nearby.
> > 
> > First an alert went to Maxima, then the defense batteries - 2
> turrets - at 
> > the end of the Ark - appeared & prepared for the intruders. A 
tough
> shield 
> > however appeared around the command room/bridge.
> > 
>

<DIV><STRONG>: : Kup : :</STRONG></DIV>
<P>Kup sees that his old security code wasn't working. The computer had been tampered with.</P>
<P><STRONG>Kup: </STRONG>Damn! I cant bring the shields down that way. Convoy is correct about isolating your fire on direct points thought. The deflector shields will be weakest on the port and starboard sides where the shield generators are located. Concentrate your fire there, then procede to the autoguns, once you have broken through the shields.</P>
<P>Kup then listens to QuetZalcoatl and Empath.</P>
<P><STRONG>Kup: </STRONG>I should be ordering you away from here! This starship is Autobot property and falls under the protection of the Maximals. I'm not about to let any slaggin' Preds or Decepticreeps tamper with it.</P>
<P>Kup takes aim at Empath, and releases three plasma shots.</P>
<P>Kup also sees who has arrived and is talking to WheelJack-X.</P>
<P><STRONG>Kup: </STRONG>Grimlock?! Is that you, lad? How can any of you Dinobots be here? I thought the last of the Autobot ranks were killed when the Tripredacus took over Cbertron.</P>
